learningEcosystemPageSteps.intro:
Learning ecosystem

This page contains an overview of your progress on the program. By clicking on the phases tab, you can also view the phases of the program and it is where you will be submitting your outputs.

Progress Overview

This shows your weekly progress in your submissions.

Weekly Outputs

This contains the progress you have made in the program over different the week(s).

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

weeklyOutputsHints.hint: This shows the phase and the percentage in terms of submissions you have made that are required on the phase.

Program Phases

Here you find all the phases in your program and you will be able to submit your outputs through this page.


Watch Demo

This has all the outputs that are related to the Output Quality Metric
Watch Demo

weeklyOutputsSteps.intro: Shows the weekly outputs progress and submission for a learner.

week1OutputSteps.intro:
Week 1 Outputs

This shows the Phases, percentage Progress and number of Submissions for outputs submitted by a learner in week 1.

Phases Column

Phases column has different phases of a learner for week 1

Progress Column

Progress column shows percentage progress for a phase for week 1

Submissions Column

Submission column shows the number of submission made for a phases by a learner for week 1.

phasesTabHints.hint: This has all the outputs that are related to the Values Alignment Metric
This has all the outputs that are related to the Output Quality Metric

phasesTabTourSteps.intro:
Your Program Phases

Here are all the phases that the program you are attending will have.

Phases Bar

This is the phases bar and it shows all the outputs for all the weeks the learner submitted them.

Values Alignment Metric

This shows all the outputs related to the alignment of your values against those of Andela.

Output Quality Metric

This shows all the outputs related to the quality of your outputs.

Watch Demo

Feedback Metric

This has all the outputs related to accepting and giving feedback.

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

valuesAlignmentTourSteps.intro:
Values Alignment Table
This is Values Alignment Table. It displays the submission's related to Expected learning outcome, Description, Outputs, Due Date, Action and LFA Feedback.

Learning Outcomes Column

This column displays all expected learning outcomes on Values Alignment Metric.

Description Column

This column displays the description of an expected learning outcome.

Output Column

This column holds the task description of an expected learning outcome.

Due Date Column

This column displays the due date of an expected learning outcome.

Action Column

This column displays the action that you are supposed to take on the given learning outcome

LFA Column

This column displays the buttons that pops up the view feedback modal of a given learning outcome

Show More Link

On clicking this link, you will be able to see more description of an expected learning outcome
Upon clicking  this button, a view Feedback/Submission modal will pop up.

outPutQualityTourSteps.intro:
Output Quality Table
This is Values Alignment Table. It displays the submission's related to Expected learning outcome, Description, Outputs, Due Date, Action and LFA Feedback.

Learning Outcomes Column

This column displays all expected learning outcomes on Values Alignment Metric.
Upon clicking this button, a view Feedback/Submission modal will pop up. Watch Demo

feedbackTourSteps.intro:
Values Alignment Table
This is Values Alignment Table. It displays the submission's related to Expected learning outcome, Description, Outputs, Due Date, Action and LFA Feedback.

Learning Outcomes Column

This column displays all expected learning outcomes on Values Alignment Metric.
Upon clicking  this button, a view Feedback modal will pop up.

Feedback Modal

Upon clicking this button, a view Feedback/Submission modal will pop up.

feedbackModalSteps.intro:
View Feedback Modal

This is the View Feedback Modal.

Feedback Criteria Container

This has Phases, Framework, Output and All Feedback for a learner.

Feedback Content

This has the Feedback Impression and Feedback Details.

Close Button

This button closes the Learner Feedback Modal.

submissionModalSteps.intro:
Learner Output Submission Modal

This is the Learner Output Submission Modal.

Learner Submission Form

Has a link for a learner to enter file URL , click to upload a file holder and a description input for describing the file submitted.

takeThisTourAgainHint.hint:
You can take the tour again by clicking on this icon
See you later!
